website_summaries.verdict: A traditional set that's versatile and can be used in a variety of ways. Includes well-made components and is manufactured by a top name in fondue pots.
pros: The 2 quart cast iron pot melts cheese quickly and can be used separately too
Classic set includes a fondue burner and 6 fondue forks
Black wrought iron réchaud can be used on any cooking surface
cons: The 2 quart pot isn't designed for large groups, but this won't concern everyone
Some didn't get fondue forks with their sets

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, well built
customer_reviews.text: This works well for cheeses. They can burn in the center, but the pot cleans easily. The pot is heavy cast iron that is coated with enamel (I believe). The forks work better with bread than the two prong forks do. I bought this after having used a stainless steel fondue pot for a couple of years, and getting frustrated with the burning of the cheese. I found out it was really better for meats/oils, the ceramic better for chocolates, and the enamel ones were better for cheeses. The pot can slide a bit on the stand, but the raised edges keep it from sliding off.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional, as well as easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These fondue sets are even more beautiful in person and so easy to use and to clean. Makes entertaining guests with dips easy and unique-such a departure from the typical hostess offerings of chips and dips or cold finger foods!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Butera

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the fondue pots in Europe. Perfect for cheese. Easy to clean (provided you don't let your cheese burn).
customer_reviews.author: Dotti

customer_reviews.title: It is a great gift for somebody who loves cooking and family time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fondue maker for my mom on Christmas and she absolutely loves it! Since I gave it to her we have made chocolate and cheese fondue on several occasions. It is a great gift for somebody who loves cooking and family time.
customer_reviews.author: Rossana M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, versatile and proud to show it off.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this Fondue set. I wish had taken a picture. It is a beautiful pot, heavy cast iron, with enamel inside and out for easy cleaning. It can be used for cheese, chocolate or a beef fondue. I made a cheese fondue, had some left over and reheated it in the same pot. The oil from the cheese had a tendency to separate but I kept stirring and the oil once again blended back into the fondue. Next I will do a chocolate desert fondue. Yummm!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Have!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter introduced me into Fonduing. (is that a word?) She has a little electric pot which was fine but I decided on this one after a bit of research. I think it is easier to maintain the perfect heat with a gel fire and also...you can use this anywhere without electricity. The pot is heavy duty and the best part is that the cheese (or whatever) DOES NOT STICK...let it soak in water for a just a few minutes and voila'....it wipes clean every time. This is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: We like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described. Size is adequate for a nice company to get together and share the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Peter

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE SAY "CHEESE"!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Well worth the extra money as it's a decent size, very sturdy and looks great. Have used it only for cheese so far. Don't bother with cheaper alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline stephen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fondue set. Cast Iron is incredibly heavy. Serving forks are a little bit chintzy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great choice large or small group.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fondue pot. It is large enough to hold a double batch of cheese fondue. It was easy to clean and held heat well while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sound Diva

customer_reviews.title: Love this but super hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Still working on finding the best way to clean this. Was great for a party! We ordered an extra 6 fondue forks and it was definitely big enough for sharing with 8 people. The look is gorgeous, too!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fondue
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Fondue. Cast iron is the perfect material for a pot that is used for fondue. Warming base could be a little bit more secure. But pot is heavy enough to maintain its stability,The pot will slide side to side.This is not a big issue for us. But one should use caution.when using this pot on a warming plate like this.
customer_reviews.author: Barrington Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as 2011 model but still does a good job
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as the one I have from 2011. Changes to the handle and rim make it feel and look cheaper. Works great. Keeps an even temperature. Easy to use. Seems durable. Used 1 time so far.
customer_reviews.author: S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional:  Best Fondue set I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Couldn't be nicer. Love the wooden handles on forks, the heavy/sturdy construction of the pot and the stand. Beautiful, cleans up easily and perfectly. I've been through 3 ceramic fondu sets prior to this that all cracked immediately or eventually. I am sure this one will never give me that problem being cast iron. Cast iron is the best and the finish is beautiful. Beautiful details.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Great basic Fondue Set
customer_reviews.text: Great fondue set. get the Swissmar fire liquid and you are set. Don't worry about the lack of a sponge in the rechaud, just fill it up with liquid and set on fire. Great for cheese and meat fondues.
customer_reviews.author: Jens F. Poschet

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this fondue pot. Easy to clean even with burnt on cheese and keeps fondue at an even temperature without burning it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Makes cheese or chocolate fondue EASY
customer_reviews.text: The pro quality enamel pan prevents scorch and burning. Excellent design and exactly like the unit we dined from in Switzerland. Safe fire pot and not likely to tip over. Be sure to put pads on metal screws on bottom of stove to avoid scratching table
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Quality set.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet but it's very similar to my original smaller set. It's heavy and high quality. WARNING: the pot advertised and shown as Red is actually oxblood/burgundy colored. Will matter if you want matching linens or plates.
customer_reviews.author: T. Byam

customer_reviews.title: this is the best quality and
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several Fondue makers over the years. By far, this is the best quality and, has exceeded my expectations! I love the fact that you can heat the pot on the stove and then, transport it to the table. A beautiful heirloom quality piece, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LoJe

customer_reviews.title: Love this fondue pot!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fondue pot! Just like the one we used in Switzerland!
customer_reviews.author: VW

customer_reviews.title: Great, but watch the handle
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the in-laws a couple christmases ago, to replace their aging fondue pot. This pot works great for cheese fondue! The handle gets hot as hell though, so have a good pot holder with a strong grip when you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I thought it might be too small to hold all the cheese, wine, etc. for my fondue,but it is just perfect! We had a fondue party last week, and this pot was the star of the show!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wlson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but disappointed on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in the fact that it advertises saying it comes with one burning paste when in fact it doesn’t come with any. I was looking forward to enjoying it tonight when I received it. Now I have to wait until tomorrow until a store opens where I can buy the paste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can start my cheese fondue right on the stove !
customer_reviews.text: I love my new fondue pot ! The heavy enamel-glazed cast iron is the perfect medium for cheese and chocolate fondue as it continues to keep the sauce at consistent temperature even once it's over the flame supplied at the stand. Perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Vettraino

customer_reviews.title: Great porcelain lined cast iron bowl
customer_reviews.text: this size serves four as dinner - eight as an app. According to my wife who was recently in Switzerland on business, the enclosed recipe produces an authentic flavored fondue. Important - follow the recipe exactly. Good cheese and Kirsch are necessary if you are looking for a true Swiss treat. Remember to purchase the fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Dafydd

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese fondue!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my sister, she loves it. It was easy to use, easy to clean, and made amazing cheese fondue. My parents and brother have different brands and styles and they were envious of hers.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Love me some fondue!!
customer_reviews.text: Stop reading the reviews and just get it. You're welcome :)
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The unit had a flaw it was returned but have not received replacement
customer_reviews.author: James Hentschel

customer_reviews.title: Solid, cast iron pot. The stand is slippery ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid, cast iron pot. The stand is slippery, so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: nice and heavy duty! a little pricey though.
customer_reviews.text: HD pot that can be used right on the stove! holds a large capacity of cheese, enough for 4 adults. one fork came pre-broken. I didn't feel too badly about spending that kind of $ thinking it was actually made in switzerland. look again, its made in, you guessed it!! MIC! Rrrrr!!!
customer_reviews.author: William Allen

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit. Heavy and seemingly good quality. Base sturdy. We bought a much more expensive fondue in Switzerland years ago and aside from the cosmetics they are hard to tell apart
customer_reviews.author: c e powerspinkus

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! We use it every couple of week a pain to clean it. Just soak it in soapy water overnight. Then use a plastic spatula to clean the stickie cheese
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: The real thing
customer_reviews.text: I’m french. It is exactly what I remember from growing up in the alps, even if the product in made in China. Well done
customer_reviews.author: Eric L.

customer_reviews.title: New Year's Eve dinner was a great success and as some people noted the pot moves ...
customer_reviews.text: New Year's Eve dinner was a great success and as some people noted the pot moves a little but has not been an issue at all and would think this is normal
customer_reviews.author: Kallen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for anyone who wants to enjoy a wide variety of fondue recipes. The cast iron is heavy, but it will allow one to enjoy traditional cheese fondue as well as oil and broth fondues as well. The clean-up is easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Fondue Set
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty Fondue Set. The cast iron pan will be long lasting. It is easy to handle and easy to clean. The pan is a little heavy though.
customer_reviews.author: Pius Schenker

customer_reviews.title: solid performer
customer_reviews.text: All ready used twice, heavy solid well built. If treated with reasonable care should last a life time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Great fondue pot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Well made, sturdy, well packaged. The heavy duty pot holds even temperature well. Much better than some of the light weight pots one often sees on the market.
customer_reviews.author: DayTexas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect can use for almost anything. Do wish it had a lid as well
customer_reviews.author: Shanel

customer_reviews.title: Nice fondue set
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean - made cheese fondue with the set and was happy with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Myriam T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Authentic ceramic Swiss fondue product. I would definitely buy this again and refer people to this specific maker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fondue pot
customer_reviews.text: We love our fondue pot! After going to Switzerland last spring and having authentic Swiss fondue in Gruyere castle, we didn't want to settle for anything less than a pot that our fondue was served in there. We found this pot, and ordered it right away and were very satisfied with our purchase. We've now made fondue in it about a dozen times for guests and even ourselves, and it turned out perfectly every time. The pot looks great and is nice and heavy, since it is made of cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: The set is really nice and great quality
customer_reviews.text: The set is really nice and great quality, but one of the forks was already broken when I received it (they're made of wood, not plastic) and the firegel was missing. Glad I had bought some just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Your favorite GeGe

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I use it on a regular basis and all the pieces are built out of very durable material and are pretty easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent return policy for the 2 I didn't need
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping. This is a large fondue pot. I ordered 4 only needed 2. Excellent return policy for the 2 I didn't need.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cast iron works on any cooking surface
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful enameled cast iron pot, with the huge bonus that works beautifully on an induction cooktop. The forks are very heavy duty, but unfortunately not color coded.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cheese fondue
customer_reviews.text: Works great for cheese fondue. Burner did not come with any way to add alcohol. I added cotton to the fuel holder then filled it with alcohol and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: beautiful pot
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Swissmar Lugano cheese fondue pot! It is made of heavyweight enameled cast iron and the stand is sturdy so I had no worry either of scorching from the heat source or tipping from a flimsy set up, both of which I've experienced with other pots. It is also a good, generous size, plenty enough capacity for the recipe I followed. Another nice thing is you can use the gel burner packs or you can fill the burner with liquid fuel, both will work. The black finish is nice, it goes with anything and doesn't give me flashbacks to the 1970's!
customer_reviews.author: MichelleB

customer_reviews.title: Worked well.
customer_reviews.text: worked well. Just had to buy a grill lighter to ignite the heating liquid. Did scratch the porcelain where some fondue stuck.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and it the weight is nice. I had difficulty finding fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product works well and we are enjoying the cheese fondue with friends. It has a nice look to it and the pot is strong and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but for ugly stand
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pot for cheese fondue that I could transfer from the stove to a serving stand with a warmer of some kind. This certainly meets those goals. The pot is nice and heavy, with a kind of ceramic enameled interior. I could wish that the stand wasn't quite so ugly (I like simple, more minimalist design), but I can't complain about the performance.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Swissmar Lugano Cheese Fondue, 9-piece, Black
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy quality cast iron fondue set that will last forever. Cooks evenly and presents well for all occasions. Can be a bit difficult finding the right cooking gel in stores so you might want to buy online the same time you order the fondue set.
customer_reviews.author: JulianeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Fon-doing it!!
customer_reviews.text: Fon-doing!! Looked at Le Cruseset (spelled correct!??) fondue pot and the cost is really high and couldn't justify spending the money for it. This pot is made in China unfortunately but is still great quality for the money. My sister who lives in Switzerland has the same one so, my guess is that I didn't waste my money unless we're both dopes, it's a possibilitiy. Anyway, I feel it was Money well spent. Just a note the enamel will scratch if your not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Vincaso

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Cast iron holds and conducts heat well. Enamel interior great for cleaning up. Does not come with fuel though.
customer_reviews.author: Zandolee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fondue pot. It's very heavy and holds heat well. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ecarl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this big fondue pot! Cast iron heats evenly on stove and comfortable handle makes transferring to stand easy. Enamel surface on inside makes for easy clean up too.
customer_reviews.author: dawngmb

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!
customer_reviews.text: This fondue pot is the real thing! Made great fondue, kept and even temperature and was very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Will be buying another pot to do cheese ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Will be buying another pot to do cheese and chocolate at the same time. Very easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece of equipment! Heavy constructed, resistant and elegant. Highly recommend it. I'm going to buy another one so I can make cheese and chocolate in the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Ademar S Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Very top heavy
customer_reviews.text: The top is made of cast iron. The base is made of very light aluminum. People usually drink alcohol when enjoying fondue. It's not a big leap to see the top full of hot chocolate being dumped on the table. And, the base container that is supposed to hold the liquid flame gel is way too small. That also got dumped all over the dining room table. The base is painted black, but has wear or scratch marks all over it that show the aluminum. Possibly this was an attempt at "shabby chic" that failed. I would not recommend this to a friend. I am returning this item. It's way to expensive to have all these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: High quality, elegant set.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set! Best I've owned. Easy to clean. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Schacht

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: We just received and have used twice. I appreciate that it is heavy and well crafter and does an excellent job with cheese fondue. Have not yet used for other types. What is not obvious is that the stand and the plate underneath are attached. We didn't like this, but you can unscrew the base from the plate so we did. At least the stand is not attached to the pot (which some fondue pots are and I would never want). So far, so good. Will update after more experience.
customer_reviews.author: CVH

customer_reviews.title: Love the pot but package arrived without any fondue forks ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the pot but package arrived without any fondue forks or fire gel. Both of these were described as being included. Have tried to contact seller, to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: pilot

customer_reviews.title: This pot was fine, but when I received it
customer_reviews.text: This pot was fine, but when I received it, I realized it was much smaller than what I wanted. So I returned it and re-ordered the 2.6 qt. cheese fondue pots. This one would work fine, but would basically serve 3-4 people, where the 2.6 can serve 6-7 people comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: jldh

customer_reviews.title: Best fondue pot ever
customer_reviews.text: The Swissmar Lugano fondue pot is the best one I have used. I bought it because my old one kept getting hot spots and the cheese would be difficult to remove. I used this model in Switzerland and loved it but couldn't bring it home because of its cost and weight. When I saw it on Amazon, I was delighted and purchased it right away. Because it is cast iron with an enamel interior, there are no hot spots and every easy to clean. And the six fondue forks are three-prong instead of two-prong which are in many sets. The three-prong arrangement makes them great for dipping items heavier than just bread; like small potatoes or veggies.
customer_reviews.author: R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Beware, Made in China: not so great quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's better than the thin aluminum pots, but otherwise it's quality isn't great for the price, made in China, and it shows - the rechaud is cheaply put together, not "wrought iron" but stamped metal that has been spray painted, the screws on the base scratched table top, forks are meh, and the quality of the enamel on the pot isn't good. Having bought one, I wouldn't do it again - there are better out there. But, it's worth repeating, it's much better than the thin aluminum ones. Just not worth the price for a chinese fondue pot.
customer_reviews.author: e.

customer_reviews.title: Well made fondue pot!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful authentic pot! Looks very expensive and it’s very easy to use. Nice cheese fondue recipe included. The secret to smoothing a cheese fondue sauce is to squeeze a couple of drops of fresh lemon juice into the sauce while constantly stirring until smoother. We will enjoy this pot for years.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Vance

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal Swiss Fondue Pot
customer_reviews.text: When I was stopping by Switzerland for the weekend (money issues prevented me from stopping by for longer...) I saw this exact same pot all over the stores. I asked the locals in Geneva if this is legit and they all assured me it was. Rest assured, having dinner alone that night, I was served fondue with this exact same pot. “Just buy it on Amazon!” everyone said...SO: Immediately upon my return to the USA, I bought it, and then 3 years later? Bought the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: MarkToMarket

customer_reviews.title: Just like the Alps
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality just like I experienced in the Alps. Friends said our fondue was the highlight meal of the winter.
customer_reviews.author: itsDane

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Great for cheese fondue. Beautiful color red.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this fondue pot! The enamel coated cast iron is amazingly sturdy and the red enamel glaze is such a beautiful color. I don't love the aesthetic of the holder, but it serves its purpose. We have used this twice for cheese fondue and you can use it right on your gas or electric burner to cook your fondue and then transfer it over to the fondue pot holder. One pot is all you need. Easy clean up. I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality fondue set, love the color
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied that I have an authentic Swiss fondue set and not some cheapo electric one that wont last more than a few years. This is the way they do fondue in Europe, they start it on the stove them move it to the fondue warmer in the same pot. The color is gorgeous and its just a very high quality set. One minor complaint is one of the wooden forks was broken but I didn't bother to send it back due to that.
customer_reviews.author: alter

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great fondue pot! It’s beautiful too just like the traditional ones. It makes a really fun interactive dinner party. The one thing I did notice on my stand is that it doesn’t sit 100% level. Although it doesn’t effect how anything works. I would still recommend this pot over other electric ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Big!
customer_reviews.text: Beware. This fondue pot is waaaay too large for 2-4 people. I can't imagine how much cheese it would take to fill it properly, and lesser amounts will bubble away into crust too quickly. Optimum standard size is 1 - 1.5 quart. I wish the webpage had been more clear about its size. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Chorch

customer_reviews.title: Will last forever!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, functional, sturdy pot. I just wish the pot didn't slide around on the stand so much. With a full pot of fondue, it doesn't slide as much and I don't really think it can slide completely off because of the lip around the edge.
customer_reviews.author: MsPulp

customer_reviews.title: Swissmar Lugano Fondue S
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well made, good size for entertaining, and works like a charm. Several reviews have mentioned that the forks are not color coded, or numbered. The included forks are for fondue, not meat, and therefore are not normally left in the pot. Numbering or otherwise coding is not necessary. This unit is beautiful, and will last a lifetime if cared for. The stand, and gel holder are excellent. I recommend purchasing the Swissmar gel. A little goes a long way. Purchase this, and enjoy great fondues!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Great pot
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the metal base, as it made it unnecessary to find a metal tray to put under it. If it's used the way it's SUPPOSED to be used, that is, with bottled gel, it's perfect. I didn't have that and attempted to use a large can of Sterno. That's not possible because the container for the gel is not removable. So I'll follow directions and purchase the gel. The pot itself is terrific. I'm looking forward to many more fondue parties with this product. Don't hesitate to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Madzi

customer_reviews.title: Very Swiss authentic.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Worked very well. Melted the cheese quickly and uniformly. Clean up was pretty easy after a little soaking in hot soapy water.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B

customer_reviews.title: Doing Fondue with your Sweetie
customer_reviews.text: This pot is heavy cast iron and uses a flamable gel (not NAPALM) heat source to keep things warm. I thought about getting an electric fondue pot, but who wants a cord around to trip over? An electric source also limits you on where you are going to serve this. I choose the black color because a fire source is used and I would not have to worry about cleaning black marks off a lighter color. The ceramic inside makes for an easy clean-up. Fondues are fun and a pleasant way to dine with a friend or friends.
customer_reviews.author: Columbus Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Great buy as it works really well, cleans easily, and looks great. Going out for fondue can be really pricey and for me is usually hit and miss. Being that fondue is super easy to make it was nice being able to do it at home for much cheaper. Really love this product and would recommend it to anyone looking to get into making fondue.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: It works for other dishes besides fondue
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit heavy, but that is not a downside as our pottery one cracked.
customer_reviews.author: DALE E. BROOKS

customer_reviews.title: Made a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for our daughter and she says she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: we love it
customer_reviews.text: really enjoyed it. easy to use and very very easy to clean up! I bought the gel that was recommend for the fondue and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: not most comfortable for a heavy pot
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of handle is flat, not most comfortable for a heavy pot. Doesn't fit snug on heating rack, but doesn't seem a risk to fall off. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an authentic fondue Valaisanne!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second caquelon and rechaud from Swissmar. We love it. It is sturdy, well made and makes an excellent fondue.
customer_reviews.author: MNM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Attractive, very nice forks & nice cast iron pot worked great to preheat fondu on stovetop. It kept our Swiss cheese fondu warm to the last drop with just a tiny bit of scorching. Easy cleanup. As other reviewers have stated...the pot slips on the base a bit, but with its weight, this didn't cause a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We've used it for cheese fondue numerous times. It is easy to use, and easy to clean. I think it is best used for 4+ people. If you are trying to make a fondue for just 2 people you will either have a hard time keeping it the right temperature (since the bowl is so big, and it will just be a thin layer) or you will end up eating too much.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I tried using this as a double boiler, but couldn't find the right size bowl to fit. The bowl I used was just a little too small, and didn't get hot enough. However if you're using it normally, it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Heathr

customer_reviews.title: Great Look and Easy Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: It excels at being easy to clean. Might seem silly that it's my top comment on a review, but it's definitely important to me. Looks great. Keeps cheese melted at a nice temperature. Enough forks for all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Koschwitz

customer_reviews.title: Very good fondue pot.
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer had written, the forks have three instead of two tines. Pot on top of the stand is a bit slippery. On the plus side, we made wonderful fondues in the heavy cast iron pot. A very good buy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Solid fondue pot. Heavy construction and easy to clean. Use it all the time! Recommend heating the cheese in another lot on the stove, then transferring. But, you can heat in this pot itself on your stove, if desired.
customer_reviews.author: francf16

customer_reviews.title: This is almost too pretty to use
customer_reviews.text: This is almost too pretty to use. Very solid and just stunning. We have used it 3 or 4 times and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rita

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my daughter & she loves it. Her previous one was a thin metal that was difficult to keep the cheese fondue from burning. She said this heats evenly & she didn't have any problems with burning. She & her family are really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: sandy j.

customer_reviews.title: Very good fondue pot
customer_reviews.text: Well made fondue pot. It arrived on time in a well packaged Box. Tried it. Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: KdS from Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set. Doesn't look cheap, does a great job at what it is for. I only tried cheese and chocolate as of today and it was amazing. For the first timers, I would recommend buying fondue kit on grocery store instead of making everything yourself. Also, do clean it right a way; otherwise you going to have bad time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey C.

customer_reviews.title: This fondue set works great, we used it for xmas dinner this year
customer_reviews.text: This fondue set works great, we used it for xmas dinner this year. It was a nice interactive way to have a meal with family. Fun
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Fondue.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I have been looking for. I think it would be best for cheese fondue. Used it already and the cheese fondue was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: CSMJLM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and durable. Enamel coating makes for an easy clean up. Previous comment on the pan sliding a bit on the base is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen A Gulson

customer_reviews.title: A good quality set
customer_reviews.text: My wife was craving cheese fondue so I shopped around and decided on this one. Sooo much better than the el-cheapos that were all over the place. The heavy cast-iron heats up evenly on the stove and it has a nice comfortable handle. Clean up afterwards was easy. The stand is solidly constructed, quite stable, and protects the tabletop. The burner works well with gel, though it takes a half dozen wooden matches to get it going enough to sustain the flame, and goes down to a good simmer. About the only minus I can think of is there's no way to tell the forks apart.
customer_reviews.author: GearGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fondue pot... it heats evenly and does not burn. It is nice and big and is a pretty color - I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: LaDawn Jones

product_meta.title: Swissmar Lugano 9 Piece Cheese Fondue Set in Cherry Red
product_meta.description: Color:Cherry RedCheese fondue is a traditional Swiss dish, fun to serve and enjoyable to eat. This traditional style cast iron cheese fondue set includes a red cast iron fondue pot, a black wrought iron warming stand, six cheese fondue forks and a dual function burner. The pot is enamelled inside and provides even heat distribution. It can be used on all heat sources and is easy to clean. 8.25 inches w. x 7 inches h. Capacity - 2 Qts.
feature_bullets: Enameled cast iron fondue pot; rests on rechaud/stand or can be used at stovetop
Paste burner includes 1 swissmar, 3-ounce fire-gel container
Set includes 6 fondue forks and 1 recipe; use wooden or non-stick utensils to prepare fondue
Set measures 15 by 10-3/4 by 9-inch; weighs 12 pounds

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars271 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
